content: row 19 rs knit 1 ssk knit to the last 3 stitches k2tog knit 1 40 stitches row 20 ws knit to the end row 21 rs knit 1 ssk knit to the last 3 stitches k2tog knit 1 38 stitches row 22 ws bind off knit wise finishing weave in ends sew the button on block and enjoy ws - wrong side rs - right side yo - yarn over pm - place marker k2tog- knit two stitches together kfb - knit into the front and back of the stitch 2 stitches in one stitch sm- slip marker ssk slip slip knit together rm remove marker taiga hilliard designs ©taiga hilliard all rights reserved 2025 this pattern is for personal use only you can print this pattern but cannot distribute by hardcopy or electronically for free or for sale page 2
